Room.Name: Fountain and Pool
Room.ShortDescription: You are in a resting area near a large fountain and quiet pool.
Room.LongDescription: A number of trees surround this area, making it a quiet and peaceful place to relax. Directly to the north is the famous statue of King Lyanden and Prince Ragnar, while to the south is the southern tunnel through the back part of the castle. A hedge separates this area from the east side of the courtyard, muffling the sounds you hear coming from there.
